talents.name: Bish-Bash-Bosh Repair
talents.desc:
**Normal Attack**
Performs up to 3 consecutive strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. 

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Musecatcher
talents.desc:
Aino throws a **Musecatcher** forward, dealing **Hydro DMG** and dragging her along behind it. When the dragging stops, Aino deals **AoE Hydro DMG** to nearby opponents.
Holding the Skill will cause it to behave differently.

**Hold**
Enter Aiming Mode to adjust the Musecatcher's throwing direction.

ult.name: Precision Hydronic Cooler
ult.desc:
Aino deploys a custom water-spraying device, the **Cool Your Jets Ducky** to establish a **Focused Hydronic Cooling Zone**.
While active, the Cool Your Jets Ducky will periodically fire water balls at nearby opponents, dealing **Hydro DMG**.

passive.name: Modular Efficiency Protocol
passive.desc:
Aino will be granted the corresponding buff effects based on the party's **Moonsign**.

**Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam**: Her Elemental Burst **Precision Hydronic Cooler** is enhanced: The **Cool Your Jets Ducky** will fire water balls more frequently, and the water balls will deal **AoE Hydro DMG** over a larger area of effect.
[Details title="Precision Hydronic Cooler"]Aino deploys a custom water-spraying device, the **Cool Your Jets Ducky** to establish a **Focused Hydronic Cooling Zone**.
While active, the Cool Your Jets Ducky will periodically fire water balls at nearby opponents, dealing **Hydro DMG**.[/Details]

passive.name: Structured Power Booster
passive.desc: Aino's Elemental Burst DMG is increased by 50% of her Elemental Mastery.

passive.name: Moonsign Benediction: Force Limit Analysis
passive.desc: When Aino is in the party, the party's **Moonsign** will increase by 1 level.

passive.name: Miniaturized Detection Sensor
passive.desc:
Displays the location of nearby **resources unique to Nod-Krai** on the mini-map.
Additionally, Aino appears to be able to alter the Cool Your Jets Ducky's appearance in some way...

constellations.name: The Theory of Ash—Field Equilibrium
constellations.desc:
After Aino uses her Elemental Skill **Musecatcher** or her Elemental Burst **Precision Hydronic Cooler**, her Elemental Mastery will be increased by 80. The Elemental Mastery of other nearby active party members will be increased by 80 for 15s.

The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.
[Details title="Musecatcher"]Aino throws a **Musecatcher** forward, dealing **Hydro DMG** and dragging her along behind it. When the dragging stops, Aino deals **AoE Hydro DMG** to nearby opponents.
Holding the Skill will cause it to behave differently.

**Hold**
Enter Aiming Mode to adjust the Musecatcher's throwing direction.[/Details]
[Details title="Precision Hydronic Cooler"]Aino deploys a custom water-spraying device, the **Cool Your Jets Ducky** to establish a **Focused Hydronic Cooling Zone**.
While active, the Cool Your Jets Ducky will periodically fire water balls at nearby opponents, dealing **Hydro DMG**.[/Details]

constellations.name: The Principle of Transference in Gear Differentials
constellations.desc:
If Aino is off-field while the **Focused Hydronic Cooling Zone** of her Elemental Burst **Precision Hydronic Cooler** is active, when your active party member hits a nearby opponent with an attack, the **Cool Your Jets Ducky** will fire an additional water ball at that opponent, dealing **AoE Hydro DMG** equal to 25% of Aino's ATK and 100% of her Elemental Mastery. This DMG is considered Elemental Burst DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.
[Details title="Precision Hydronic Cooler"]Aino deploys a custom water-spraying device, the **Cool Your Jets Ducky** to establish a **Focused Hydronic Cooling Zone**.
While active, the Cool Your Jets Ducky will periodically fire water balls at nearby opponents, dealing **Hydro DMG**.[/Details]

constellations.name: Cake and the Art of Mechanism Repair
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of **Precision Hydronic Cooler** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
[Details title="Precision Hydronic Cooler"]Aino deploys a custom water-spraying device, the **Cool Your Jets Ducky** to establish a **Focused Hydronic Cooling Zone**.
While active, the Cool Your Jets Ducky will periodically fire water balls at nearby opponents, dealing **Hydro DMG**.[/Details]

constellations.name: Butter and Cats and the Law of Energy Supply
constellations.desc:
When the Elemental Skill **Musecatcher** hits an opponent, it will restore 10 Elemental Energy for Aino. Energy can be restored to her in this manner once every 10s.
[Details title="Musecatcher"]Aino throws a **Musecatcher** forward, dealing **Hydro DMG** and dragging her along behind it. When the dragging stops, Aino deals **AoE Hydro DMG** to nearby opponents.
Holding the Skill will cause it to behave differently.

**Hold**
Enter Aiming Mode to adjust the Musecatcher's throwing direction.[/Details]

constellations.name: Perpetual Turbine of Metal and Light
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of **Musecatcher** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
[Details title="Musecatcher"]Aino throws a **Musecatcher** forward, dealing **Hydro DMG** and dragging her along behind it. When the dragging stops, Aino deals **AoE Hydro DMG** to nearby opponents.
Holding the Skill will cause it to behave differently.

**Hold**
Enter Aiming Mode to adjust the Musecatcher's throwing direction.[/Details]

constellations.name: The Burden of Creative Genius
constellations.desc:
For the next 15s after using the Elemental Burst **Precision Hydronic Cooler**, DMG from nearby active characters' Electro-Charged, Bloom, Lunar-Charged, and Lunar-Bloom reactions is increased by 15%.
**Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam**: DMG from the aforementioned reactions will be further increased by 20%.
[Details title="Precision Hydronic Cooler"]Aino deploys a custom water-spraying device, the **Cool Your Jets Ducky** to establish a **Focused Hydronic Cooling Zone**.
While active, the Cool Your Jets Ducky will periodically fire water balls at nearby opponents, dealing **Hydro DMG**.[/Details]
